Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Excellent facilities for a (small) conference. Good climate controls.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text:
Good place to have meetings / workshops.  Has good options for lunch as well as snacks / coffee / refreshments.  .
Power cabling in meeting rooms could be improved.   The washrooms do not have hot water, which is an issue during winter.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Nice place with good live music played and good ambience. You can choose from a broad list of drinks and also nachos here is great. Good for official as well as personal meetings.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Ideally located place close to Zuid station for conferences and meet ups. Standard food and drinks but a great place for meet & greet . Could be a bit expensive for private parties .

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Unmatched atmosphere at the Zuid As, with its live piano music during lunch time. Menu is diverse enough, staff is friendly.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Nice place. Horrible service. Need to wait 20 minutes each time to order or anything. It's like they don't care about the business. If I was the owner all the waiters are fired.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Love it! Great place for from quick drink to relax and work/study. Very connected and convenient access to Amsterdam Zuid Station.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: I came to this place for a business related venue, the place is well located. However, he staff should learn the trade and learn to smile before being let loose on the patrons..

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: We had a gathering in their upstairs rooms. The location, facilities & staff were perfect üëå.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text:
Eclectic mix of meeting rooms, culture, social, bar and restaurant.

Food was good, the bar has a nice ambience.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Its a fantastic cafe to read, have a nice coffee or eat. Also great for meeting and there is always something happening!

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Good location. Parking practically in front. Meeting rooms available.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Terrible service for dinner, 20 minutes to have someone pick up the order. Atmosphere of a brown bar, prices of a fancy restaurant.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Nice bar and venue for events. Nice bar in the Zuidas area, which offer options to rent spaces for events.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: I tried a burger but taste was not my expectation.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Very cool and comfortable place. Has live piano music most of the times.

Name: De Nieuwe Poort
Review Text: Warm & friendly atmosphere & the same can be said about the staff....Professional  & courteous. I will visit soon...üçÄ

Review Text: The best bar/restaurant in Zuid area. Great staff.
